ECA.name: The Cultural Trailblazer
ECA.description: Loves vibrant cities, historical landmarks, art, and exciting activities.

ECN.name: The Urban Aestheticist
ECN.description: Enjoys artistic urban vibes, beautiful landscapes, and relaxed cultural experiences.

EFA.name: The Gourmet Adventurer
EFA.description: A passionate foodie who enjoys exploring local flavors, markets, and lively activities.

EFN.name: The Social Foodie
EFN.description: Loves vibrant food scenes, cafés, and relaxed city exploration with scenic views.

ICA.name: The Quiet Explorer
ICA.description: Prefers calm cultural experiences, hidden historical spots, and light adventures.

ICN.name: The Serene Culturalist
ICN.description: Enjoys tranquil art, nature, traditional towns, and peaceful scenery.

IFA.name: The Solo Food Adventurer
IFA.description: Explores cafés, markets, and local cuisine with occasional light activities.

IFN.name: The Gentle Wanderer
IFN.description: Seeks peaceful nature, cozy cafés, beautiful scenery, and slow travel.
